title: El Morro National Monument: Things To Know Before You Come
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Know Before You Come             Things To Know Before You Come       The staff at El Morro National Monument looks forward to your visit! Click on the brown links above for information to make your visit as enjoyable as possible. In addition, you may always contact us for more information.       A Student Conservation Association intern explainsthe significance of El Morro National Monument. NPS photo       New Firearm RegulationsNew firearm regulations will take effect on February 22, 2010. Make sure you know the law before your visit; click here to read all the details.
